title: Chapter 1268 - Come On, Let’S Keep Going!
body:
Chapter 1268 - Come On, Let’S Keep Going!

Heaven and earth were silent. The landscape was devastated, seemingly laid to ruin.

Su Yi stood there in the distance, jug of wine in hand, as he sank into thought.

Earlier, he had clashed with that sword qi swathed in immortal qi. Its power was truly far too terrifying.

It was more than a World King’s power of the Laws could contend with.

Both the mysteries of reincarnation and the Laws of Profound Ruin struggled to contend with it.

In the end, he had to use the shield manifested of the Dark and Gold Fortune Vine to block that sword qi, but the impact still sent him flying back.

The power of the Immortal Dao is far beyond that of a World King. It’s like the gap between men and the heavens; it’s too great to overcome, Su Yi thought to himself.

But this only made Su Yi even more curious.

If I grasp this immortal-level sword formation, will I be able to perceive the secrets of the Immortal Dao?

It’s a formation, so it surely requires vast reserves of power to circulate. Especially since it’s an immortal-level sword formation; their expenditures are unquestionably shocking.

If I can wear down its energy reserves, I’ll be able to neutralize it with ease!

As Su Yi reached this conclusion, he threw back his head and drained his jug of wine. He’d made a decision.

……

original_title: Chapter 1268 - Come On, Let’s Keep Going!
